author: Geoffrey Morgan
title: ‘We’re very cautious not to screw it up’: All eyes on Saskatchewan as businesses get OK to re-open
description: 'Opening up a restaurant if nobody is showing up is pointless': economist
content:
CALGARY – Jason Zalusky will be watching Saskatchewan’s coronavirus infection rates closely to determine whether or not he reopens his barber shop on May 19, as allowed under the plan Premier Scott Moe announced Thursday.
If any of his staff aren’t comfortab… [+5114 chars]
